Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.model

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.model.GameBoard
public class GameBoard extends Object
This class represents the game board into the game model.
Author:
Riccardo Milici

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard(int statusMotherNatureIsland, String statusInfluenceBonus, HouseColor statusIgnoreColor, com.google.gson.JsonArray statusIslands, com.google.gson.JsonArray statusClouds, com.google.gson.JsonArray statusSpecialCharacters)
      Default class constructor.
      Parameters:
      statusMotherNatureIsland - The id of the island on which mother nature is placed.
      statusInfluenceBonus - The name of the player with an influence bonus.
      statusIgnoreColor - The color to ignore during the resolution of an island.
      statusIslands - The islands.
      statusClouds - The clouds.
      statusSpecialCharacters - The special characters.
